document_data.mainbody: ne Sages Wyrmbook was a book on dragons by the sage Maskalandur Narlur of the city-state of Ormpur on the edge of Lapaliiya in southwest Faer√ªn, published in the Year of the Gauntlet, 1369 DR. It told of notable dragons like the song dragon Taraunramorlamurla who dwelled in Waterdeep.
